channel.title: Adding bank booth
channel.description: how would i add a bank booth? if there is a tut on how to please give me a link.

item.title: Adding bank booth
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

find
makeGlobalObject
or
AddGlobalObj
^ use pre existing voids to your advantage
for example if you have AddGlobalObj, and you wanted a bank booth like i have in my main room, add this into the void
AddGlobalObj(2998, 3373, 11758, -2, 10); //bank booth
//a remark
is optional
now, to break this down, the first two ints are the x and y coords
the third int is the ID of your object your adding
fourth int is the direction your object is facing(starts at -3, and goes up to 0)
fifth is the object type, 10 is used for normal objects
post for more help

Read full topic
